Text:
About 20 mins of the second half is has a "experiencing technical difficulties" screen (about 10 minutes into the second half). So you miss one of the goals.

Quality is good but what use is part of the game? I give the capper the benefit of the doubt and say that they don't know about the missing part, but if you can find a verified upload I would go for that one, not this.

WTF?! Who uploads a sporting event with 15 minutes missing — including a goal — and doesn't even bother to mention that???

What planet are you from ...?
